history.content:
Depends on your perspective.

I think the Spring version is harder conceptually, but the Summer version is faster-paced. If you're good at independent learning, then Summer might be good for you.

----------

Summer version is 61BL, which is quite different since there are very few lectures. I initially intended to take 61BL this summer but found it better to take it during semester and I dropped it (mostly because I'm not very good at self-learning and I hate the everyday labs...). It really depends on person. I recommend semester version personally.

----------

Took 61BL here. I personally liked the more hands-on style of 61BL. Also, find a dependable TA/LA and you have the opportunity to get direct help from the staff on regular basis, which is nice. YMMV.

---------

Took it last spring with Hug, who I think teaches the course really well. Recommended. You don't need to learn as much on your own if you do it in the semester.

Depends on your perspective.

Should I take CS61B in summer or next Spring? Which one is easier. I took it with Hilfinger this semester for a while but couldn't stand it
history.subject: CS 61B in summer?
